about_the_game:
You can find your goods from the Collector's Edition Upgrade in your game folder.
To access it, you need to:
1. Right click on the game in your Steam library and select ""Properties"".
2. A window will open, then just click on the ""LOCAL FILES"" tab.
3. In the ""LOCAL FILES"" tab, click the ""BROWSE LOCAL FILES..."" button. This will open an explorer window.
4. Then there will be folder ""Collector's Edition Upgrade"" where you can find what is listed below.

Gold Mining Simualator- Collector's Edition Upgrade features the following items:

DIGITAL ARTBOOK

  • 74 page of art
  • Highly detailed 3D images
  • Astonishing sketches
  • Lifelike screenshots
  • Wonderful concept arts

PAPERCRAFT

  • Model of an excavator

WALLPAPERS PACK

  • 1080p and 4k
  • 16:9 screen ratio
  • PNG/JPG

HIGH QUALITY POSTERS PACK

  • High-resolution for print
  • PNG/JPG

OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK

  • Full Soundtrack
  • Lossless Wav (16bit/44.1kHz) and Hq Mp3 (320 kbps)
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Art book update:

  • Japanese language added
  • Dutch language added
  • Norwegian language added


Update Notes

Art book update:

  • English language corrected
  • Russian language added


Update Notes

Art book is now available in additional languages:

  • German
  • French
  • Italian
  • Spanish
  • Portuguese
  • Simplified Chinese
  • Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Gold Mining Simulator - Collector's Edition Upgrade contains a digital Artbook as well as a Wallpapers Pack and the Full Official Soundtrack. Additionally there is a printable High Quality Posters Pack and a Paper Craft Excavator Model.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Dutch, Japanese
